code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import dayjs from'dayjs';import{Avatar}from'@material-ui/core';dayjs.locale('zh-hk');var columns=[{name:'Image',selector:'imageUrl',sortable:false,cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{alt:"",src:row.imageUrl,children:"--"});}},{name:'Rule Name',sortable:true,selector:'_id',cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-tag":"allowRowEvents",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"rules/edit/".concat(row._id)},children:row.ruleName})});}},{name:'Start Date',selector:'startDate',sortable:true,cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-tag":"allowRowEvents",children:dayjs(row.startDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')});}},{name:'End Date',selector:'endDate',sortable:true,cell:function cell(row){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-tag":"allowRowEvents",children:dayjs(row.endDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD')});}},{name:'Description',selector:'description',sortable:true}];export default columns;
